> **This vignette is currently under active development.**

- unzip folder with configuration and database files


```{r}
install.packages("devtools")
install.packages("omicser")

devtools::install_github("ndcn/omicser")
```

Follow prompts in console to install and update all associated packages.

Load the `omicser` package (and ensure it installed properly)

```{r}
library(omicser)
```
